description.english: Kill 5 enemies with one explosive barrel.

description.koreana: 컨베이어 벨트에 매달린 통으로 적을 제거하십시오

description.english: Trap 10 enemies with one gravity pull and kill them all within 5 seconds.

description.tchinese: 使用一次重力牽引誘捕 10 名敵人，並在 5 秒內將其全部擊斃
